Rank.Description: The movement speed reduction caused Arctic Blast, Eye of the Storm, Hailstorm, Icy Vortex and Wind Chill, reduce movement speed by an additional 3% and deals Water damage to the enemy each second based on your Spell Power while they are moving.

The movement speed reduction caused Arctic Blast, Eye of the Storm, Hailstorm, Icy Vortex and Wind Chill, reduce movement speed by an additional 6% and deals Water damage to the enemy each second based on your Spell Power while they are moving.

The movement speed reduction caused Arctic Blast, Eye of the Storm, Hailstorm, Icy Vortex and Wind Chill, reduce movement speed by an additional 10% and deals Water damage to the enemy each second based on your Spell Power while they are moving.
Increases your damage by 1%.
Increases your damage by 2%.
Increases your damage by 3%.
Increases your damage by 4%.
Increases your damage by 5%.
Reduces the cast time of your Air and Water spells by 4% and all other spells by 1%. Reduces the mana cost of non-instant Air and Water abilities by 4%.
Reduces the cast time of your Air and Water spells by 8% and all other spells by 2%. Reduces the mana cost of non-instant Air and Water abilities by 8%.
Reduces the cast time of your Air and Water spells by 12% and all other spells by 3%. Reduces the mana cost of non-instant Air and Water abilities by 12%.
Reduces the cast time of your Air and Water spells by 16% and all other spells by 4%. Reduces the mana cost of non-instant Air and Water abilities by 16%.
Reduces the cast time of your Air and Water spells by 20% and all other spells by 5%. Reduces the mana cost of non-instant Air and Water abilities by 20%.

Gives your damaging Air abilities a 33% chance to make your next Icicle, within 10 seconds, instant, reduce its mana cost by 40% and increases the damage bonus of that Icicle by 150%. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

Gives your damaging Air abilities a 66% chance to make your next Icicle, within 10 seconds, instant, reduce its mana cost by 40% and increases the damage bonus of that Icicle by 150%. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.

Gives your damaging Air abilities a 100% chance to make your next Icicle, within 10 seconds, instant, reduce its mana cost by 40% and increases the damage bonus of that Icicle by 150%. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.
Increases the damage of your area effect abilities by 4%.
Increases the damage of your area effect abilities by 8%.
Increases the damage of your area effect abilities by 12%.
Reduces the pushback caused by damaging attacks while casting area effect spells by 50%.
Reduces the pushback caused by damaging attacks while casting area effect spells by 100%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Air spells by 3% and increases their damage by 3%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Air spells by 6% and increases their damage by 6%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Air spells by 9% and increases their damage by 9%.
Increases the damage of your Water spells by 3%.
Increases the damage of your Water spells by 6%.
Increases the damage of your Water spells by 9%.
Increases the damage of your Water spells by 12%.
Increases the damage of your Water spells by 15%.

Ability.Description: Knocks back up to 5 enemies in front of the Mage. Snares affected enemies, reducing their movement speed by 20%, for up to 10s.

Rank.Description: Your Electrocute, Thunderbolt and Raging Storm deal 5% more damage if the enemy is suffering from Hypothermia.
Your Electrocute, Thunderbolt and Raging Storm deal 10% more damage if the enemy is suffering from Hypothermia.
Increases the damage bonus of your Static Flux by 2%.
Increases the damage bonus of your Static Flux by 4%.
Increases the damage bonus of your Static Flux by 6%.
Increases the damage bonus of your Static Flux by 8%.
Increases the damage bonus of your Static Flux by 10%.
Increases the maximum number of enemies Forked Lightning can hit by 2.
Increases the maximum number of enemies Forked Lightning can hit by 4.
Increases the maximum number of enemies Forked Lightning can hit by 6.
Enemies who are Electrified by you take an additional 3% damage from your Air and Water spells for each of your Electrified effects on them. Does not affect damage from melee attacks.
Enemies who are Electrified by you take an additional 6% damage from your Air and Water spells for each of your Electrified effects on them. Does not affect damage from melee attacks.
Enemies who are Electrified by you take an additional 9% damage from your Air and Water spells for each of your Electrified effects on them. Does not affect damage from melee attacks.

Supercharges your Lightning Field, causing each enemy damaged by Lightning Field to chain the damage to up to 3 enemies within 10 meters who are Electrified. Removes 1 Electrified effect from each enemy hit.

Ability.Description: Deals 386 to 427 Water damage. Increases Air and Water damage taken from the Mage by 2% per stack of Electrified for 15s. Does not stack with Piercing Beam.

Rank.Description: Increases damage bonus provided by your Ice Shear by 2% per stack of Electrified.
Increases damage bonus provided by your Ice Shear by 4% per stack of Electrified.

Ability.Description: Deals 377 to 416 Air damage to up to 8 Electrified enemies.
Deals 2467 Air damage over 6s to up to 8 enemies in the target area. Enemies with 3, or more, stacks of Electrified are Rooted. Generates 6 Charge each second.

Rank.Description: Enemies who are affected by your Hypothermia take an additional 5% damage from your area effect abilities.
Enemies who are affected by your Hypothermia take an additional 10% damage from your area effect abilities.
Enemies who are affected by your Hypothermia take an additional 15% damage from your area effect abilities.

Reduces the global cooldown of your Air and Water spells 1.33 seconds, reduces the mana cost of your area effect abilities by 5%, your instant Air and Water abilities by 11% and increases the damage of your area effect abilities by 5%.

Reduces the global cooldown of your Air and Water spells to 1.17 seconds, reduces the mana cost of your area effect abilities by 10%, your instant Air and Water abilities by 22% and increases the damage of your area effect abilities by 10%.

Reduces the global cooldown of your Air and Water spells to 1 second, reduces the mana cost of your area effect abilities by 15%, your instant Air and Water spells by 33% and increases the damage of your area effect abilities by 15%.
Increases the maximum stack size of your Electrified effects by 1.
Increases the maximum stack size of your Electrified effects by 2.

Ability.Description: Applies the Mage's maximum number of Electrified stacks to the enemy.

Deals 172 to 190 Air damage, per stack of Electrified on the initial target, to up to 8 enemies within 7 meters of the initial target. Applies a number of Electrified stacks to each enemy hit equal to the number on the initial target.
Reduces damage taken by 25%. When hit, applies Hypothermia and snares the attacker, reducing their movement speed by 20%, for up to 10s.

AbilityRank.Description: Increases all resists by 50. Causes Electrocute and Raging Storm to root the enemy for the duration of their channels. Lasts 1h. Counts as a Mage Armor.

Increases single target damage by 15% and all resists by 50. Casting a damaging Water ability causes the Mage's next area effect ability, within 10s, to be instant. Cannot occur more than once every 10s. Lasts 1h. Counts as a Mage Armor.
